html.p: Inputs can be configured in the Inputs section of the Linode Add-on.
Linode event inputs are configured using the following settings:

tr.td: Determines how frequently the input should poll for event updates (minimum 180s).
The Splunk index to store new events in.

A read-only Linode API Token created on the account to retrieve events from. See the official
Linode API documentation
for more details.
The start date of events to be collected. This can be used to retroactively import events that occured prior to input creation.

html.p: After an event is created, it will automatically save new events to the configured index on the configured interval.
See the official Splunk Addon Linode repository for more information.
